title: Karlie Kloss bares midriff in black cutout dress for opening of Nordstrom flagship store in NYC
text:
She just celebrated her first wedding anniversary with Joshua Kushner.

And on Tuesday night, model Karlie Kloss walked the red carpet at the star-studded opening for the new Nordstrom flagship store in New York.

The 27-year-old flashed her midriff in a black dress featuring a long-sleeve cropped bodice and ankle-length skirt.

On trend: Model Karlie Kloss walked the red carpet at the star-studded opening for the new Nordstrom flagship store in New York wearing a black cutout dress that showed off her midriff

Her outfit was open at the back, baring part of her back and her legs from behind.

She paired her outfit with calf-high white boots with black laces and zippers.

Kloss' blonde bobbed hair was styled with a center parting and curled under her chin while her eyes were ringed with black liner and mascara.

Model look: Kloss' blonde bobbed hair was styled with a center parting and curled under her chin while her eyes were ringed with black liner and mascara

Posed: The 27-year-old's dress featured a long-sleeve cropped bodice and ankle-length skirt. Her outfit was open at the back, baring part of her back and her legs from behind

Quirky choice: Kloss paired her outfit with calf-high white boots with black laces and zippers

The new department store is located at 57th and Broadway in Manhattan and spans more than 300,000 square feet over seven floors.

In addition to men and women's clothing, shoes and accessories, the Nordstrom will also offer beauty items, kids items and home goods.

The store boasts several restaurants and bars as well as original artwork.

Married: Kloss just celebrated her first wedding anniversary with Joshua Kushner, younger brother of Jared Kushner. The couple are pictured Monday in New York
description: The model, 27, paired her outfit with calf-high white boots with black laces and zippers.
